name: Zumba Garden
description:
Your garden has been overrun by hordes of marble-pushing golems... lucky for you. you're armed with a trusty marble cannon with endless ammo, plenty of powerups, and the determination to score as many points as possible :)

A simple, classic sphere-matching recipe for casual fun. Try it!

Game features:
  • 60 beautiful levels
  • 14 upgradable powerups
  • Clean, pleasant environments
  • Relaxing music
